title: Gratitude: Expressing Thanks (Specific) (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Expressing Thanks (Specific) subcategory within Gratitude. Includes 3 card(s).

cards.japanese: 教えてくれてありがとう。

cards.english: Thank you for paying for my lunch.
cards.japanese: お昼ご飯、ありがとうございます。
来ていただいて、どうもありがとうございます。
